pages.title: Tree Chopping
pages.text: $(thing)Trees/$ can be progressively chopped by using an $(item)Axe/$ on the base. Note that there must be natural (not placed by the player) $(item)Leaves/$ connected to the logs to count as a $(thing)Tree/$. An icon of an $(item)Axe/$ will appear next to the crosshairs if $(thing)Tree Chopping/$ is active.
This behavior can be disabled by $(bold)Sneaking/$ while mining the block, causing each individual $(item)Log/$ to drop normally.
